Articles.Content:
Hi all, just had to register.

OMG, I got soo hooked on this game. It\'s great.

I managed to land on the Mun and return to Kerbin on my second day, using the guide from the wiki.

Anyway, I can\'t wait to see the progress of the game since the planned additions look very promising indeed.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Grah Rabble Rabble Rabble!

Capt\'n Phoxtane

[Hah! Beat ya, Skunky!]

Maligayang pagdating sa Forum ng KSP!

Maligayang Pagpapalipad!

Kapitan Flixx
